name: The Megaladon
description:
You have fallen into an underwater cave while scouting for a location to cave dive. Now you are trapped and faced with a megaladon and limited oxygen.

Tips

You have to grab the air tank or you won't have enough air to make it through

Sprinting increases your oxygen consumption so, sprint wisely.

Controls

I made this in 6 days as a challenge for myself! I hope you enjoy it!
